name: Irina Baloi
review: Valentina is an excellent translator. I would recommend her without hesitation for any translations from and into English, French and Romanian. She possesses very good skills in legislation and official documents translation. The accuracy of her translations and the ability to finish the job on time well deserve the mentioning. Thank you Valentina for your good services, I will definitely come back!

name: Adina Teusan
review: Hi Valentina, thank you for your promptness and professionalism when translating my High-school diploma. Really appreciated it. I would recommend Valentina to anyone who needs a translator for Romanian into English. Adina.

name: Julian Gamentz
review: I was fortunate to collaborate with Valentina. She did a great job, extremely fast and a very professional way! Do not hesitate and call her for any need of translation! I take this opportunity to recommend her and thank her one more time. I am a real estate broker and I will strongly recommend her to all my clients. Thank you indeed, Valentina!

name: Alexandru Jora
review: I came to Valentina with a very urgent translation request and she provided an excellent and very rapid service. I recommend her to anyone who needs translation from/to Romanian, French and English.

name: Andreea Brabete
review: Valentina is a great professional! She was really helpful with my translation. Thank you, Valentina! I would like to recommend her to anyone who needs translation from/to Romanian, French and English.

name: Costa Pintilei
review: Valentina is a very proficient translator EN-FR-RO. I was looking for the translation service of some civil legal documents. She was easy to reach and her delivery time was unexpectedly fast for a very reasonable cost. I wholeheartedly recommend her translation skills.

name: Adrian Stancescu
review: Valentina was very professional and extremely fast. No hesitation in recommending her services.

name: Kirsa Hage
review: Valentina took on a urgent project for me and did a very good job. Deadline and quality were both kept and very good. I can recommend Valentina’s services any day.

name: Daniel Popescu
review: I really am grateful for Valentina's professional and efficient translations. I needed both my bachelor's and master's degrees translated in less than a week and she helped me without hesitation. I definitely recommend her services for translations in Romanian, English or French. Thank you Valentina!

name: George Angel
review: I had an important and relatively urgent project concerning evidence in a case in the US. The number of documents to be translated was quite sizable. Valentina provided a fair estimate and an adequate period of time to complete the project but, most importantly, she actually completed it within the parameters and time frame provided (including a bit of additional work at the last minute). I am very satisfied with the quality of the translation and the service. It's great to work with people who actually deliver on their promise!

name: Cristi Zamfir
review: Many thanks to Valentina for the translations of the certificates needed in very short deadline. Excellent, fast and high quality translation. Highly recommended to anybody who needs translation to and from English, Romanian and French!

name: Ioana M.
review: Valentina, thank you for the great job and the professional service. I would warmly recommend you to anyone!

name: Nadia Cojocaru
review: Very professional and efficient! Thank you! Definitely recommend!

name: Ioana Constantinescu
review: Valentina is the only translator I work with in Montreal. Great and prompt service, she has managed to save me a few times when I needed documents translated from one day to the next. I worked with her in English, French and Romanian and I strongly recommend her.

name: Dan Lazescu
review: Valentina is a very professional translator from Romanian to English, also her service is very quick, precise and up to the point! Thank you! Definitely I recommend her services!

name: Alex Firescu
review: I contacted Valentina to request certified translations of official documents. The service was extremely professional, fast, and efficient. I was greatly impressed and I would recommend her expertise to anybody interested in good quality and professionalism.

name: George Savin
review: It was a pleasant experience to work with Valentina. Thank you for your professionalism!

name: Raid Attir
review: I had the chance to use Valentina's Romanian-English Translation services for a government application. Her service was outstanding. First, translation was prepared in a timely manner. Secondly, she answers e-mails instantly. I highly recommend her for future jobs.

name: Alina Gorcovenco
review: Excellent and fast service provided, I highly recommend her as professional. I had a very good experience, thank you Valentina!

name: Dorin Negrea
review: Hi Valentina! I want you to know how much I appreciate the excellent service you provided. You are professional, precise and very rapid. It was a pleasant experience and I would recommend your services to anybody interested.

name: Lumi Dimiu
review: I highly recommend Valentina Catana. She took care of me in a prompt manner and my request was completed in a timely and professionnal way.

name: Adrian
review: Fast and very professional. Good price. Recommended!!

name: Camelia Tulus
review: Valentina helped me with translations from/to Romanian, English and French. She was very fast and professional. I highly recommend her.
